data.message: I'm playing Criminal Case-trying to get ahead,and I watched the film two times;the first time,I didn't get the 20 units of energy the game promised,so I watched it again-it had 2 parts to it. But I still didn't get the 20 points.I should have 40 points for watching it twice.Can you PLEASE help with this??

replies.message: Hi Sharon. Apps and games are managed by developers outside of Facebook. If you need help with an app or game, contact the developer directly. Learn how at: http://on.fb.me/1PZSeCG. -Sidney
